pr_title: CATROID-624 "For each value from *list* in <variables-spinner>" Brick

timeline.message: CATROID-624 "For each value from *list* in <variables-spinner>" Brick
CATROID-624 "For each value from *list* in <variables-spinner>" Brick

timeline.bodyText: not really important but please remove one tab by each <Spinner
timeline.author: Koell
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -0,0 +1,74 @@
+<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
+<!--
+  ~ Catroid: An on-device visual programming system for Android devices
+  ~ Copyright (C) 2010-2020 The Catrobat Team
+  ~ (<http://developer.catrobat.org/credits>)

+  ~ it under the terms of the GNU Affero General Public License as
+  ~ published by the Free Software Foundation, either version 3 of the
+  ~ License, or (at your option) any later version.
+  ~
+  ~ An additional term exception under section 7 of the GNU Affero
+  ~ General Public License, version 3, is available at
+  ~ http://developer.catrobat.org/license_additional_term
+  ~
+  ~ This program is distributed in the hope that it will be useful,
+  ~ but WITHOUT ANY WARRANTY; without even the implied warranty of
+  ~ MERCHANTABILITY or FITNESS FOR A PARTICULAR PURPOSE. See the
+  ~ GNU Affero General Public License for more details.
+  ~
+  ~ You should have received a copy of the GNU Affero General Public License
+  ~ along with this program.  If not, see <http://www.gnu.org/licenses/>.
+  -->
+
+<LinearLayout xmlns:android="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android"
+    xmlns:app="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res-auto"
+    android:layout_width="match_parent"
+    android:layout_height="wrap_content"
+    android:gravity="center_vertical"
+    android:orientation="horizontal">
+
+    <CheckBox
+        android:id="@+id/brick_checkbox"
+        android:layout_width="wrap_content"
+        android:layout_height="wrap_content"
+        android:gravity="center_vertical"
+        android:visibility="gone" />
+
+    <org.catrobat.catroid.ui.BrickLayout
+        android:id="@+id/brick_repeat_layout"
+        style="@style/BrickContainer.Control.Small"
+        android:layout_height="match_parent">
+
+        <include layout="@layout/icon_brick_category_control" />
+
+        <TextView
+            android:id="@+id/brick_for_values_from_label"
+            style="@style/BrickText.SingleLine"
+            android:text="@string/brick_loop_for_each_value_from">
+        </TextView>
+		
+		<Spinner
+            android:id="@+id/for_item_in_userlist_list_spinner"
+            android:layout_width="match_parent"
+            android:layout_height="wrap_content" 
+			android:textDirection="locale" />
+
+        <TextView
+            android:id="@+id/brick_loop_in_label"
+            style="@style/BrickText.SingleLine"
+			android:text="@string/brick_loop_in">
+        </TextView>
+		
+		<Spinner
+            android:id="@+id/for_item_in_userlist_variable_spinner"
+            android:layout_width="match_parent"

timeline.bodyText: please extend the UserDataBrick instead of the UserListBrick to reduce codeduplication
timeline.author: Koell

replies.bodyText: with that you can define the UserList & UserVariable similar to a new Formula
replies.author: Koell

replies.bodyText: I actually searched for exactly such a class but completely overlooked it
replies.author: Rawbat
